definition: to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
perspiration/sweat/CL:滴[di1],頭|头[tou2],身[shen1]/to be speechless (out of helplessness, embarrassment etc) (Internet slang used as an interjection)
see 可汗[ke4 han2], 汗國|汗国[han2 guo2]

sentences.english: But if you always need to wipe your hands or often sweat through your clothes, it may be more than a "guy" thing. It could be excessive sweating, called hyperhidrosis.
sentences.chinese: 這是過度出汗，叫做多汗症。

sentences.english: The average foot perspires a pint of moisture per day.
sentences.chinese: 平均腳出汗一品脫每天的水分。

sentences.english: If you're sweaty, a fresh outfit also helps.
sentences.chinese: 如果出汗了，換身衣服也有用。

sentences.english: Sometimes a person stops sweating when heatstroke hits.
sentences.chinese: 有時候，發生中暑時，患者會停止出汗。

sentences.english: Most commonly used in deodorants to plug up your pores and to not allow you to sweat.
sentences.chinese: 大多用於除臭劑中，堵塞了毛孔並防止出汗。

sentences.english: Yes, when I wake up, my heart beats very fast and I am perspiring.
sentences.chinese: 當我醒來的時候，心跳得非常快，而且在出汗。

sentences.english: The person often perspires, harmful to health?
sentences.chinese: 人老是出汗，對健康有害嗎？

sentences.english: If a person is inclined to perspire, does this affect the impact of fragrance?
sentences.chinese: 如果一個人容易出汗，會影響香水的效果嗎？

sentences.english: I wrote the combination on my hand, but my hand was so sweaty it came off.I was late to every class.
sentences.chinese: 我把密碼寫在手上，但是手出汗太多，字跡看不到了。

sentences.english: Did not forget to duplicate filling besmear product after swim or a large number of perspiring .
sentences.chinese: 在游泳或大量出汗後別忘了重複補塗產品。

sentences.english: Some patients develop premonitory signs and symptoms, such as nervousness, sweating, and tachycardia.
sentences.chinese: 病人可有先兆性症狀，例如易於激動，出汗和。

sentences.english: Does a hard-working woman sweat like a man?
sentences.chinese: 女人在大量運動後出汗量和男人一樣多嗎？

sentences.english: The first thing he noticed was that he was perspiring.
sentences.chinese: 他注意到的第一件事是他正在出汗。

sentences.english: Summer perspires much, should not fill only water, should still complement what vitamin?
sentences.chinese: 夏天出汗多，不應只補水，還應補充什麼維生素？

sentences.english: The old woman worked up a sweat in the garden.
sentences.chinese: 老婦人在花園裏幹活幹得出汗了。

definition: to have a high temperature/feverish/unable to think calmly/to emit heat
